smallMolecules.name: ATP aptamer
smallMolecules.description: ATP (Adenosine 5'-triphosphate) is an important substance for energy storage and metabolism in the body, which provides energy for metabolism and plays a role as a coenzyme in cells. ATP is an important endogenous signal molecule in immunity and inflammation.

smallMolecules.name: B4-25 aptamer
smallMolecules.description: Reactive Blue 4 is an anthraquinone dye, as a single colorimetric chemosensor for sequential determination of multiple analytes with different optical responses in aqueous media. Reactive Blue 4 is phytotoxic, cytotoxic and genotoxic.

smallMolecules.name: Pepper aptamer
smallMolecules.description: HBC ((4-((2-hydroxyethyl)(methyl)amino)-benzylidene)-cyanophenyl-acetonitrile) is a synthetic dye similar to GFP fluorophores, featuring a structurally rigid electron acceptor and a strong electron donor.

aminoAcids.name: Example amino acid aptamer
aminoAcids.description: Example description for amino acid aptamer.
